name: cake
detailedDescription:
Mmmm tasty and healthy.
Well, maybe not so healthy but it really is cake - no lie!
It's a pretty hefty cake.

attributes.chargesDescription: There's enough here for about $charges good-sized $chargeUnit
attributes.taste: It's fresh, sweet and moist with a layer of buttercream icing and jam.
attributes.smell:
You bend down and sniff at the cake. It doesn't smell of much except sugar and baking.
As this is obviously meant to be shared around, you try not to be too obvious about breathing all over it.
